description:
Our team at the Anastopoulo Law Firm offers dedicated personal injury services to people in Charlotte, North Carolina, and throughout the state. Without warning, accidents may leave people with life-altering injuries and innumerable challenges. We aid those injured through no fault of their own, helping them seek the compensation they deserve through negotiations with the insurance companies or, if necessary, in the courtroom.

In addition to our Charlotte office, our law firm has a Lumberton location and six offices throughout South Carolina. We aggressively pursue our clients' rights and interests, representing them with cases involving matters such as the following:

  • Animal bites
  • Birth injuries and medical malpractice
  • Motor vehicle and trucking accidents
  • Premises liability
  • Product liability
  • Wrongful death

We also assist clients with workers' compensation claims. Our attorneys guide injured workers through the claims process, helping them complete the necessary forms and gather any needed supporting documentation, to obtain the benefits they need and deserve.

At the Anastopoulo Law Firm, we recognize the upheaval that brain and other serious injuries may have on accident victims, as well as on their families. Our team is sensitive to what our clients are going through, and we provide tireless advocacy aimed at helping them recover the maximum damages for their injury-associated losses. Our firm offers free initial consultations.
